title: Provision of this Regulation may also be applicable to lease hold plots of Govt
clause_text: Provision of this Regulation may also be applicable to lease hold plots of Govt. and TMC with prior approval from Government / Municipal Corporation.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
